FFXID.Wiki: The SFX ID to use for this missile

LifeTime.Wiki: Time for projectile to exist in flight (-1 is infinite). In seconds.

HitSphereRadius.Wiki: The radius of the hit sphere. In centimetres.

distance.Wiki: If the bullet flight distance exceeds this value, the attenuation set by other parameters will be applied.

gravityInRange.Wiki: Gravity applied downward within range. In metres per second ^ 2.

gravityOutRange.Wiki: Gravity applied downward outside of range. In metres per second ^ 2.

mp.Wiki: The mana consumption when this missile is fired.

accelInRange.Wiki: Acceleration whilst projectile is within distance threshold. In metres per second ^ 2.

accelOutRange.Wiki: Acceleration whilst projectile is beyond the distance threshold. In metres per second ^ 2.

HitMissileID.Wiki: The bullet to generate when the projectile expires, or conditionally according to some launchConditionType values.

DiedNaturaly.Wiki: If ON, this missile will expire when its duration reaches zero.

ExplosionDie.Wiki: If ON, this missile will explode when its duration reaches zero.

behaviorId.Wiki: The behavior ID to apply to the victim when this missile hits.
